title: Super Cute Westside Studio With High Ceilings and Workable Kitchen.
posting_body: Cat is okay with pet deposit.
Super cute Westside studio on Laurent Street off of Mission near bus line.
Very light and bright with high ceilings.
Totally workable kitchen with full size stove and fridge.
Beautifully remodeled bathroom and huge closet.
Sweet brick patio out front with apple tree.
Shared yard with the front house.
I am now placing tenants in the front house.
They will be nice, responsible students.
We will come up with an equitable way to split the utilities between the front house and the cottage.
